timeline.message:
replace current().getLong("id") by .selected()

That should be ex actly the same thing, unless there is a real bug in
the collection. After all, current uses selected. Then get the deck
using the id. If we return the deck's id obtained through the id, it
present no interest

timeline.body:
should look like this but without the declaration above - they should be on one line

```suggestion
        long deckID = getCol().getDecks().selected();
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
should look like this but without the declaration above - they should be on one line

Suggested change
deckID = getCol().getDecks().selected();
long deckID = getCol().getDecks().selected();
timeline.author: mikehardy
